name: Foundations of Cybersecurity
description: Introduces the basics to modern cybersecurity practices.

lessons.name: Using Virual Machines
lessons.description: Basic principles of using virtual machines.

lessons.name: How to Set a Good Password
lessons.description: Overview of what it means to be a good password.

name: Foundations of Electrical Engineering
description: Understanding fundamentals of digital design and electrical engineering.

lessons.name: Logic Gates
lessons.description: Overview of different types of logic gates.

lessons.name: Building an ALU
lessons.description: Steping stone to building your own computer.

lessons.name: Finite State Machines
lessons.description: Building and understanding the use of finite state machines.

name: Theory of Computation
description: Principles behind the theory of all computation.

lessons.name: Deterministic Finite Automata
lessons.description: Overview of drawing and formalizing DFA's.

lessons.name: Converting an NFA to DFA
lessons.description: Learn to draw an NFA as a DFA.

lessons.name: Turing Machines
lessons.description: Writing tape-head level descriptions for different TM applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.
